resources.string: Search for commodities and bookmark the ones that you are interested in. They will appear here.
"Please wait while we finish setting up"
Tap the button below to proceed
Love Evlo? Tap to rate us on the Play store

The source of contents in this app are reproduced / used from http://agmarknet.nic.in


Extract from AGMARKNET portal:

 "The arrival and prices of different agricultural commodities as received from the Agricultural Produce Market Committee (APMCs) of different States are uploaded at AGMARKNET portal for information only and shall not be considered as guidance, invitation or persuasion. Users/visitors have to make their own decisions based on their own independent enquiries, appraisals, judgments, wisdom and risks. The Govt. of India shall not be liable or responsible for any loss or cost or any action whatsoever arising out of use or relying on the arrivals and prices and other related information disseminated at the portal."
Where do you get the data from?
Evlo gets its data from the Agmarknet portal (a government of India portal). The data is fetched from the Open Government Data (OGD) Platform - data.gov.in. Tap to see FAQs of the Agmarknet portal.
Why can\'t I find the market that I am looking for?
Not all markets in the country have participated in the Agmarknet project. So far 3245 markets across the country have been covered under the project as on 31 March 2015.
Why is the price not appropriate for a certain commodity?

The price reported from Agmarknet is always per Quintal (100 kg). If you find it inappropriate, please look into the commodity price in detail from Agmarknet portal. Please tap here to be redirected to the appropriate location in the Agmarknet portal where you can find the commodity price detail.
Is it possible to get historical prices?
Yes! Please tap to head over to the Agmarknet portal where historical prices can be viewed.
"Unable to Retry. You seem to be offline. Check your connection"
"Something went wrong. Please check your connection or try again later."
